content: the cast on edge under ds duplicate the last stitch worked on the right the arm then join in the round with the remaining needle by wrapping yarn over the needle on top sleeve sts place a bor marker at the middle of the of the st if next st is a purl this is a complete yo underarm sts 28 30 32 36 40 44 46 50 52 58 60 if next is a knit it is half a yo to the back 64 68 72 76 82 90 98 sts total bor beginning of round k all sts in the round until sleeve measures 1 2 3 3 4 rs right side 5 5 5 5 5 5 4 3 3 2 2 2 1 from the underarm ws wrong side © 2023 galt house of yarn all rights reserved v2 2 www galthouseofyarn ca finished measurements a b c d size chest torso sleeve sleeve circ length length circ 0-6 months 20 6 6 6 25 6-12 months 22 6 5 7 6 5 1-2 years 24 7 8 7 2-4 years 26 8 10 8 4-6 years 28 10 12 9 6-8 years 30 12 13 9 5 8-10 years 32 14 15 10 xs 34 15 16 11 s 36 15 17 12 sm 38 16 18 13 m 40 16 19 13 5 ml 42 17 19 14 l 44 18 19 15 xl 48 19 20 16 2xl 52 20 20 17 3xl 56 20 21 18 5 4xl 60 20 21 20 5xl 64 20 21 22 © 2023 galt house of yarn all rights reserved v2 2 www galthouseofyarn ca
